Presentation.Title: The Best Talking Out of Turn Mugs for All of Your Fall Sips
Presentation.Description: Still using the generic mugs from the breakroom cupboard? You’re not generic, so you deserve a coffee mug that makes a statement and tells the office how you really feel. That perfect mug is waiting for you at Talking Out of Turn (TOOT). They have a huge selection of funny coffee mugs that run the gamut from slightly sassy to “don’t talk to me until cup #2.” Stand out while you sip with their selection.
Presentation.embed: Uploaded on authorSTREAM by talkingoutofturn
